name: Quest (Urgaburf)
description:
"Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all" - Alfred Lord Tennyson. Brief

Until Quest represents the above quote it will continue to receive biweekly updates in the form of new features, new content, and bug fixes/optimizations. 

I write a daily blog, which you can access through the link below, this includes more insights into progress and some aspects of my personal life.

The game is currently an MVP and very early in its development. There currently is a small amount of content. I publish it to you though to start a timeline and get your feedback that can alter its growth.

Features
  • Overworld
  • Quests
  • Random Encounters
  • First Person Combat
Blog
  • Daily Dev Blog
Credits
  • GDD Credits
